The Washington Wizards are still winless in the 2020 NBA preseason after losing to the Detroit Pistons at Capital One Arena, 97-86 on Thursday night.
Washington made a lot of unforced errors tonight… [+3133 chars]

articles.title: Bucs ‘should’ have specialists ready to play Sunday - Bucs Nation
articles.description: A scare went around the special teams unit.
articles.content:
The Tampa Bay Buccaneers avoided the possibility of not having their specialists for this weeks game against the Atlanta Falcons. But they dont have to worry any longer.
